    • cardToImageName

      public static String cardToImageName(Card card)
      Method that associates the card passed as parameter to it's corresponding image.
      Parameters:
      card - the given card
      Returns:
      the path of the corresponding image

    • changeLabel

      public static void changeLabel(javafx.scene.control.Label label, String text)
      Method that takes a `String` and a `Label` parameters. The method uses `Platform.runLater` to update the label with the new text value. `Platform.runLater` is used to ensure that the update is executed on the JavaFX application thread, which is necessary for updating UI components.
      Parameters:
      label - the `Label` JavaFX component to change
      text - the new text to display on the label

    • addMessageToChat

      public static void addMessageToChat(String username, Message message, javafx.scene.control.ListView chat)
      Method called to add a message to the chat. It automatically adds to the message the username of the sender, and the hour and minute the message was sent. Scroll the chat to the bottom to show the last message.
      Parameters:
      username - the sender name
      message - the message to add to the chat
      chat - the `ListView` JavaFX object to which the message has to be added

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(String username, NetworkManagerInterface networkManager, javafx.scene.control.TextField messageInput, javafx.scene.control.ListView chat, javafx.scene.control.ListView players, javafx.scene.control.Label messageLabel)
      Method called to send a message. Check if the message is valid and if it is not, return after adding the error to the chat, visible only by the sender and not the others in the lobby (length check, empty message check, trying to use commands). Scroll the chat to the bottom. If the message is valid, send it to the server and add it to the chat calling the addMessageToChat() method. It is called when the "send" button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      username - the sender username
      networkManager - the networkManager to use to send the message event
      messageInput - the `TextField` JavaFX object from which to take the message
      chat - the `ListView` JavaFX object to which the message has to be added
      players - the `ListView` JavaFX object to control if the message has to be sent to a single person
      messageLabel - the `Label` JavaFX object to display any "chat-fatal" error
